subject: Maven,spring3,aspectj and junit can now run parallel tests

A full set of patches that allows parallel running of tests in maven/spring=
3/junit environment has been released.

This blogpost (http://incodewetrust=
inc.blogspot.com/) in question outlines the steps needed for parallel runni=
ng, and the expected benefits.

The patches have been submitted to the proj=
ects in question, but as of today, they do not exist in any release. The fu=
ll set of patches has been run on a "production builf system" in a highly c=
oncurrent 2-chip 8 core xeon server for a total of 7 days flat out without =
any concurrency related issues, a total of nearly 7000 builds have been run=
.

I will be maintaining this patch-set until the respective projects hopef=
ully accept the patches. (Spring, aspectj, junit and maven-surefire)

Krist=
ian Rosenvold, http://twitter.com/krosenvold for further updates
